sections.title: API Pricing
points: You only pay for the exact number of API requests that your application has sent to us

points.body: The first 50,000 requests per month are free

points: The more requests, the cheaper it gets per request
example_points: If your applications make 60,000 requests in a month
The 50,001st to 60,000th request cost €0.30 per thousand
The total cost for that month: €3.00

sections.title: Pricing for larger number of requests and custom solutions
points: Please contact us to discuss pricing and hosting options
